name: Brigitta Michaila
greetingText: btw You got an unique name arent ya?
wishText: May God always be with you! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Chailaa!! Yeyyy! I wish everything on your life goes better!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Semoga SNBP nya biru ya, God Bless You in all your way.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
